question: The HCF of two numbers 12906 and 14818 is 487. Their LCM is :
explanation:
Because product of two numbers = HCF $latex \\times$ LCM
$latex =>$ 12906 $latex \\times$ 14818 = LCM $latex \\times$ 478
$latex => LCM$ = $latex \\frac{12906\\times 14818}{478}=400086&s=1$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
